title-of-article: High-Resolution audio headphones h.ear™ / Stories / / Sony
content:
The impact of these evocative colors is also clear the moment you open the box. Packaging is part of your overall experience with products, and here, the inner box matches the color of the headphones.

The look and feel is consistent no matter which model you choose. We designed a respectable group of products, rather than emphasizing any single product in particular. Thoughtful communication design is also evident in naming this series h.ear instead of using ordinary model numbers.
